features: Persil Original laundry detergent delivers a powerful stain-fighting combination for a premium clean
Great for everyday laundry, even activewear, and to help fight tough stains
This concentrated formula delivers 2X more cleaning power in every drop vs our standard Persil liquid detergent so you don’t have to use as much to experience premium clean
Persil ProClean laundry detergents have been optimized for great performance in all types of machines, including high efficiency (HE) washers and clean effectively in cold water
Persil 2X concentrated detergent comes in a laundry detergent container that is made for delivery.
Includes one 82.5 ounce bottle of Persil 2X Concentrated liquid laundry detergent in the Persil Original scent, enough for 110 regular loads of laundry
body.description: Get exceptionally clean laundry with Persil Power-Liquid Original scent detergent. Our Original signature scent is perfect for everyday laundry. It's formulated to deliver a deep clean for all of life's messy moments. Persil laundry detergent is great for everyday laundry, even activewear, as it not only helps brighten and whiten your clothes, but also helps fight tough stains. You can use it in cold water and it works in all types of washing machines, including top-loading, front-loading, and high efficiency (HE) washers. Use with Snuggle laundry softener and laundry scent boosters to round out your laundry supplies. Experience an exceptional deep clean with Persil Original laundry soap. This concentrated formula delivers 2X more cleaning power in every drop vs our standard Persil liquid detergent, so you only need to use half as much to experience premium clean. Persil 2X concentrated detergent comes in a laundry detergent container that is made for delivery. This package includes one 82.5 fluid ounce bottle of 2X concentrated Persil laundry detergent liquid in Original scent, enough for 110 regular loads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and works well
reviews.reviewText: I'm a single guy and don't really want my laundry to smell like my granny does it. You know what I mean--a combo of Tide detergent and Downy classic fabric softener. This detergent smells clean but not flowery. It cleans well, too. I use it for my dress clothes, gym attire, and shop rags, and everything comes out clean and fresh. It takes very little detergent to do the job, too, so a bottle easily lasts longer than a month. I haven't felt the need to use fabric softener at all, and my clothes are still soft and wrinkle-free. I'm a customer for life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this brand and size
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a great cleaning soap, that gets stains out, smells great and works well in cold water, your search is over. I am living off grid so I am very particular about getting things that work the best in my situation and gives the best bang for the buck. I actually have a hand wash machine that i use until it gets too cold. This detergent works by far the best in both my off grid machine and in regular machine, both using cold water. You just can not beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Cleans My Clothes, even stinky gym shirts
reviews.reviewText: Persil is the best detergent out there now. Great value. I have tried others and used to use Tide, but it's more expensive. In fact, for removing odors, Persil works better. Works miracles the first time against tough stains and odors on clothes instead of having to wash same clothes again in another load which wastes water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The hype is real!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using persil for two months now, and I have seen significant improvement in how clean our laundry is. The smell is not too strong, but gives just enough sense to know your laundry is clean. This is going to be a staple in my home forever or as long as keep making it. Not going back to any other detergent at this point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I’ve used.
reviews.reviewText: Lightly scented. Extremely good cleaning. Wished I had found this a long time ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Switched from Tide
reviews.reviewText: The price of Tide got out of hand for a bit, so Persil jumped into the scene. It's just as good and has been doing a great job on stains and odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's not very expensive and works just fine.
reviews.reviewText: This is a good clothes soap. Very good price and cleans very well. Very good product, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love that I can Use so much less detergent, even for large loads. The scent is really nice. I love That my clothes come out smelling clean. Works great.
For long washes it works very well on stains on both whites and colours

reviews.reviewTitle: The powder was good so I bought this. Allergic to it.
reviews.reviewText: The scent is so strong my sinuses and eyes filled up immediately. I gave it away.

reviews.reviewTitle: Different smell, i don’t like it . The laundry soap is a amazing though
reviews.reviewText: This is a different scent than the Persil original
Lovely fragrance and very effective at getting our clothes clean.
Lovely fresh scent. Not overpowering like many detergents.
